name: Perfect hair Day (PhD) Dry Shampoo Value Set
about: What it is:A set of two dry shampoos to keep your style fresh by eliminating oil, sweat, and odor..Hair Texture:Straight, Wavy, and Curly.Hair Type:Fine and Medium.Hair Concerns:- Dryness.Key Benefits:- Cleans and cares like a rinse-out shampoo.Highlighted Ingredients:- Fast-Absorbing Powders: Soak up oil, sweat, and odor..Ingredient Callouts:These products are cruelty-free..What Else You Need to Know:A dry shampoo that doesnu2019t just clean hair, it cares for it. Fast-absorbing powders soak up oil, sweat, and odor and are removed with a powder-removal system. Conditioning agents refresh the scalp, balance sebum levels, and leave hair soft and shiny. The result? A freshly washed look and feel..This Set Contains:- 2x 5.5 oz/ 184 mL Perfect hair Day Advanced Clean Dry Shampoo.Clean at SephoraOur commitment to offering formulas that go beyond regulatory standards to avoid controversial ingredients without sacrificingu00a0effectiveness.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Shake can well, holding six to ten inches away from dry hair, then section and apply in a sweeping motion. .-Wait 30 seconds, then massage to remove. .. Recycling Instructions:.-These Living Proof products are recyclable through TerraCycleu00ae.
